info.title: ClickSend SMS
info.description: ClickSend for business SMS that gets delivered; alerts, notifications, invites, marketing messages and more. ClickSend is business communications software enabling companies of all shapes and sizes to easily send and receive SMS, Email, Voice and even post worldwide via web app or API. ClickSend has SMS at its core and powers billions of messages worldwide via direct routes but has expanded to offer a full suite of products providing choice and context to your business communications.
